entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • critical_finalization tests fails with GCStress=0x3 #75782
  • [NativeAOT] error when compiling tests #75780
  • JsonWriterHelper.Transcoding.cs replacement #75779
  • [wasm][debugger] protected override property not showing in inspector #75778
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Support format specifiers #75773
    8.0.0
  • Update experimental WebAssembly templates to use consistent string quotes in JS #75771
    7.0.x
  • Vector128.ShiftRightLogical doesn't use machine-instructions for some types (`byte` / `sbyte`) #75770
    8.0.0
  • [Mono] Re-enable hardware intrinsics tests when LLVM JIT is enabled for llvmaot lanes #75767
    8.0.0
  • ICorDebugThread2.InterceptCurrentException corrupts process in x64 Windows #75762
    7.0.0
  • Win32 Access Violation in EnterCriticalSection when application exits that has multiple mixed mode managed .dlls in .NET runtime inside trace.cpp trace::flush #75760
  • [API Proposal]: AsnWriter Encode with callback #75759
    Future
  • iOS app crashes on device in release build (IPA) #75758
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Tracking: Upgrade LLVM-JIT to ver. 14 #75757
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] `critical_finalization` runtime test fails on Linux #75756
    8.0.0
  • Web Assembly Blazor debug issue - Childeren could not be evulated #75763
    7.0.x
  • JIT: Reevaluate args sorting #75751
    8.0.0
  • Port CoreCLR PAL to linux-riscv64 #75749
  • The mscordbi.dll 6.0.922.42201 is missing from symbol servers. #75747
    8.0.0
  • Proxy doesn't authenticate on .NET 6 #75745
  • Add descriptions to WebAssembly Browser and Console App templates #75741
    7.0.x
  • [NativeAOT] Handle variable page size on Linux Arm64 #75737
  • PGO: Re-order blocks without side-effects #75733
    Future

Closed

  • Vxsort on Windows x64 accessing past the end of the buffer on some runtime tests #75224
    8.0.0
  • dariusmckinzie5 #75784
  • AccessViolationException when Trimming using .NET 7 preview trimming with GetTypeFromProgID #75775
  • [NativeAOT] Implement GCToEEInterface::EagerFinalized #75107
    Future
  • HttpClient crashes app with no error #75483
  • LibraryImport analyzer crashes when encountering certain attributes #75706
  • MarshallingAttributeAnalyzers throws InvalidCastException #75681
  • something about serialization #75720
  • STJ deserializes DateTime with Kind set to DateTimeKind.Unspecified when no time zone information is provided #75739
  • SpeechSynthesizerToSpeechRecognitionEngine test fails with AudioException #75753
  • Unnecessary code in System.Numerics.ConstantHelper ? #10773
    Future
  • BeginReceive Stack overflow Application crash #75660
  • [MacOS][x86] mono immediately exits with debugger-agent error #75682
  • CI failure in JIT.HardwareIntrinsics WASM test Vector64_ro: SDK Microsoft.Build.NoTargets/3.5.0 could not be found #75714

PullRequests

Created

  • Memory model document. #75790
  • [release/7.0-rc2] Do not request type layout for RuntimeDetermined types #75789
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Bump 7.0 intellisense package version (WinForms docs update) #75786
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Use *_NOCTOR jit helpers version once class is initialized #75785
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix behavior of JMC #75783
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Fix building src/tests #75781
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove unused Utils file #75777
    area-System.Security
  • Ensure that all paths of double.Hypot use the absolute value where required #75776
    area-System.Numerics
  • [mono][debugger] fix exception while decoding value that has a byref field #75774
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] Ensure Max/Min for floating-point on x86/x64 are not handled as commutative #75772
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono]Disable failing intrinsics tests for llvmaot CI lane, due to disabling LLVM JIT #75768
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Don't set JitPath for coreclr test SPMI collections #75765
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Audit MemoryExtensions.IndexOf variants #75754
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Devirtualize ldarg(s)+callvirt where possible. #75748
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [wasm] Add workaround for msbuild issue in tests #75743
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests: re-enable SIMD tests on v8, and nodejs #75742
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Skip frozen segments for commit accounting #75738
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Ignore ERROR_PIPE_NOT_CONNECTED in WindowsConsoleStream.Write #75734
    area-System.Console, community-contribution

Merged

  • Do not request type layout for RuntimeDetermined types #75746
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Pad the perm table to avoid array out of bound #75364
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-rc2] Ensure Max/Min for floating-point on x86/x64 are not handled as commutative #75761
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adding zmmStateSupport and AVX512F, AVX512CD, AVX512BW, AVX512DQ and AVX512VL ISAs. #74113
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix edge cases of getting attribute data from syntax #75727
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Ensure Max/Min for floating-point on x86/x64 are not handled as commutative #75683
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Add RID for alpine-3.17 + alpine-{x86,s390x} (backports #75396) #75530
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-rc2] Fix Configuration.Binder for collection properties with no setters #75723
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Simplify some `ADDR`-related code; fix one bug #74274
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Add RID for alpine-3.17 + alpine-{armv6,x86,s390x,ppc64le} (backports #75396) #75531
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Implement an AppContext compatibility switch re-enabling reflection fallback in STJ source generators. #75694
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Fix return code in critical_finalization test #75750
  • [DOC][MONO] Update example wasm test run command #75736
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [Android] Update DateTimeOffset.Now fast path routine #75457
    area-System.Runtime, os-android
  • [release/7.0-rc2] Fix wasm template README #75766
    area-Meta
  • Fix wasm template README #75696
    community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-rc2] Fix edge cases of getting attribute data from syntax #75728
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0-rc2] [wasm] Use newer helix images with updated v8 #75726
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0-rc2] Handle a null szPname field #75716
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Speech, 7.0.0
  • Free getline buffer after use #74899
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use MemoryMappedFileAccess.Read when searching a memory mapped file #67386
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • [wasm] CI: Run all EAT tests on runtime pipeline #75516
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Remove update to unit test for speech fix #75732
    blocking-clean-ci, area-System.Speech

Updated

  • Don't propagate const TYP_REF as TYP_I_IMPL #75661
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Improvements to CoreCLR Building, Debugging, and Testing Documentation #75569
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Try moving mobile tests into their own pipelines. #75213
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [JIT] CodeGen verification testing #75102
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add test mode that scans JIT disassembly output #75039
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add infinite codegen stress feature to crossgen2 and fix memory usage issues found while doing so #74956
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Test instrumentation #74959
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc2' => 'release/7.0' #75713
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove usages of Ubuntu 16.04 from pipelines #75513
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Fix FailFast logging message #75718
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr
  • Ensure regions never use more than 99% of the heap hard limit #75038
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add Darc dependency entries for our dependencies on Roslyn #75617
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • [Mono][Test]Disable failing iossimulator tests #74889
  • Fix numeric IntPtr behavioral changes analyzer findings #75557
    area-Meta
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Add doc for CET compatibility. #75551
  • Add support for the Aho-Corasick algorithm in regexes. #71588
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Simplify handling of multi-reg returns #74499
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • R2R fixes for [Equality]Comparer.Default in jit #75422
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Evaluate GDV call args early #75634
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Update gtHasLocalsWithAddrOp to use GenTreeVisitor #75672
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • 74642 change isostorage path #75541
    area-System.IO
  • JIT: Enhance metrics reported by superpmi diffs #74584
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix x64 cross build on arm64 macOS #75677
    os-mac-os-x, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Updating inbox source generators to Roslyn 4.4 and removing polyfill approach #75717
  • [wasm] enable issue 58812 #75444
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] fix missing managed stack trace on managed exceptions marshaled to JS #75678
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Fix Dictionary perf regression for non-string ref type keys #75663
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance
  • Add QuicError.AlpnInUse member #74754
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • [mono][tests] Fix System.Reflection.Tests.ModuleTests.GetField failing test on ARMv6 and Android #75458
    area-System.Reflection-mono
  • Extend RuntimeHelpers.IsBitwiseEquatable to more types #75640
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Resolve tvOS/iOS FileSystem test failures #74927
    area-System.IO
  • JIT: Remove GT_NULLCHECK #71707
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Enable CI for macOS x64/arm64 #75421
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Add char[] buffer to XmlRawWriter. #75411
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Remove most of string.Trim() usages in System.Private.Xml solution. #75452
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • JIT: Early expand vtable calls on ARM32 too #75604
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #72667
    area-Meta
  • WIP: [mono] Include inspection of CustomConstantAttribute when resolving default values for parameters via reflection #75612
    area-System.Reflection-mono
  • Make WriteCommentValue() overloads have same behavior. #75074
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] QueryPerformanceCounter in Pal should use CLOCK_MONOTONIC #75708
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Added snake and kebab naming policies to JSON serializer #69613
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add option for truncated stream detection #75671
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE][wasm] testing some CI trigger changes #75555
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Avoid recommitting the mark array #75208
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Enable logging managed stack trace for AV to event log #75721
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [tests] Skip XslCompiledTransformApi tests on iOS, tvOS, and when testing native AOT #75730
